lead_paragraph: Five North Carolina sheriff’s deputies were disciplined for failure to act after a black man was punched by a white Trump supporter on March 9.

headline.print_headline: Aftermath; 5 North Carolina Deputies Punished for Inaction at Trump Rally Assault
headline.main: Deputies Punished After Assault on Protester at Trump Rally

snippet: Five North Carolina sheriff’s deputies were disciplined for failure to act after a black man was punched by a white Trump supporter on March 9.
abstract: Five Cumberland County, North Carolina, sheriff's deputies are disciplined for failing to intervene when white Donald Trump supporter punched black protester at rally in Fayetteville.
